Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Prankster 8 Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.
1 Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
18 Pickpocket 7 Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.
36 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
54 Moody 10 Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
72 Contrary 12 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
90 Magician 6 The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
100 Unearthly 8 The Pokémon generates a bizarre area that swaps Attack stats when it enters battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 03 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 04 Insomnia 5 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Disc 05 Immunity 4 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Disc 08 Trace 6 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 6 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 16 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
Disc 17 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 22 Shadow Tag 10 This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Berserk 6 Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Contrary 12 Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Defiant 8 Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
Emergency Exit 4 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Immoralize 8 Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Infiltrator 8 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Limber 4 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Magician 6 The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
Moody 10 Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
Pickpocket 7 Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.
Pixilate 8 Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Prankster 8 Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Soundproof 7 Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unearthly 8 The Pokémon generates a bizarre area that swaps Attack stats when it enters battle.
Unnerve 4 Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
Indigestion 4 The Pokémon summons acid rain when it's hit by an attack.
Moxie 7 The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
Punk Rock 6 Boosts the power of sound- based moves and halves the damage taken from them.
Tangling Hair 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
